{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Finance Manager",
  "description": "Kadick Integrated Limited is a dynamic and forward-thinking company operating in the fintech and telecom sectors. We provide innovative digital solutions, agency banking services, and retail distribution across Nigeria. At Kadick, we are committed to driving financial inclusion, empowering communities, and delivering exceptional value to our partners and customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Finance Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Finance Manager to lead our financial operations and drive sustainable business growth.
	The Finance Manager will play a key role in financial operations planning, reporting, risk management, and overall financial strategy, ensuring compliance with industry regulations and global best practices.
	This position requires a proactive leader with strong financial acumen and strategic vision.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree with 5 - 8 years of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs/and applications to:&nbsp;recruitment@kadickintegrated.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note:&nbsp;Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.",
  "datePosted": "2025-07-18",
  "validThrough": "2025-08-17",

Finance Manager Job at Kadick Integrated Limited




        
    

        
        Kadick Integrated Limited is a dynamic and forward-thinking company operating in the fintech and telecom sectors. We provide innovative digital solutions, agency banking services, and retail distribution across Nigeria. At Kadick, we are committed to driving financial inclusion, empowering communities, and delivering exceptional value to our partners and customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Finance Manager

Job Location: Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Finance Manager to lead our financial operations and drive sustainable business growth.
	The Finance Manager will play a key role in financial operations planning, reporting, risk management, and overall financial strategy, ensuring compliance with industry regulations and global best practices.
	This position requires a proactive leader with strong financial acumen and strategic vision.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree with 5 - 8 years of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs/and applications to: recruitment@kadickintegrated.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Android / Flutter Developer",
  "description": "Mint Digital Bank - Mint Account is provided by Finex Microfinance Bank Ltd. Finex Microfinance Bank is licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria. All deposits are insured by the Nigerian Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC). Mint card is issued by Providus Bank under license by MasterCard.&nbsp; Smart people choose Mint - The Challenger Bank #NoNonsense Banking

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Android / Flutter Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a skilled Android Developer with solid Flutter experience to join our tech team. If you have strong experience building and maintaining Android apps with Kotlin and can work seamlessly in Flutter for cross-platform projects, we&rsquo;d love to hear from you!


What You&#39;ll Do


	Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
	Maintain and scale cross-platform apps built in Flutter.
	Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
	Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.


Requirements
What You Should Have:


	3+ years of professional Android development experience using Kotlin and/or Java.
	2+ years of experience with Flutter/Dart in production-grade applications.
	Strong understanding of RESTful APIs, mobile architectures, and performance tuning.
	Experience with third-party libraries, Firebase, push notifications, and modern development tools.
	A solid portfolio of published apps on Play Store (or GitHub).
	Passion for clean, maintainable, and well-tested code.
	Bonus: Experience working in a fintech/startup environment.


Perks &amp; Benefits


	Competitive salary
	Health insurance (HMO)
	Remote work
	Young, fast-moving, and ambitious team
	Opportunities for growth and leadership

Android / Flutter Developer Job at Mint Digital Bank




        
    

        
        Mint Digital Bank - Mint Account is provided by Finex Microfinance Bank Ltd. Finex Microfinance Bank is licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria. All deposits are insured by the Nigerian Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC). Mint card is issued by Providus Bank under license by MasterCard.  Smart people choose Mint - The Challenger Bank #NoNonsense Banking

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Android / Flutter Developer

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a skilled Android Developer with solid Flutter experience to join our tech team. If you have strong experience building and maintaining Android apps with Kotlin and can work seamlessly in Flutter for cross-platform projects, we’d love to hear from you!


What You'll Do


	Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
	Maintain and scale cross-platform apps built in Flutter.
	Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
	Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.


Requirements
What You Should Have:


	3+ years of professional Android development experience using Kotlin and/or Java.
	2+ years of experience with Flutter/Dart in production-grade applications.
	Strong understanding of RESTful APIs, mobile architectures, and performance tuning.
	Experience with third-party libraries, Firebase, push notifications, and modern development tools.
	A solid portfolio of published apps on Play Store (or GitHub).
	Passion for clean, maintainable, and well-tested code.
	Bonus: Experience working in a fintech/startup environment.


Perks & Benefits


	Competitive salary
	Health insurance (HMO)
	Remote work
	Young, fast-moving, and ambitious team
	Opportunities for growth and leadership
    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Mechanical Completions Engineer",
  "description": "Oilserv Limited is a leading provider of integrated engineering, procurement, construction, installation &amp; commissioning (EPCIC) services and complementary solutions across the asset and program life cycle within the onshore, offshore and subsea market segments of the oil and gas sector. Oilserv Limited was incorporated in 1992 and commenced operations in 1995.

We are recruiting to fill the positions below

Job Position: Mechanical Completions Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Contract

Job Summary


	The Mechanical Completions Engineer will be responsible for developing safe procedures for installation, troubleshooting and completions of mechanical equipment.
	Development and reviews of mechanical scope of works during engineering, construction and commissioning phase of works.


Job Details
Leadership:


	Provide positive and professional leadership to technicians in all departments
	Contribute to the goal zero drive of HSE
	Provide advice and support to all projects within the Group on matters relating to any issue within the remit of mechanical commissioning works


Core/Technical:


	Takes part in project planning &amp; Scheduling; prepares and keeps up -to- date the mechanical pre-commissioning and commissioning scope plans and procedures.
	Assists the Commissioning manager to co-ordinate overall Pre-commissioning, Commissioning and start-up processes of mechanical scope in new and existing pipelines and facilities from initial construction planning through to final handover to production operations/Owner.
	Participates in developing commissioning plans and procedures, together with other discipline engineers and operation personnel.
	Takes part in the Project review meetings to make sure that the commissioning requirements have been duly complied with.
	Assist with the assessment and selection of mechanical Pre-Commissioning subcontractor which includes review of subcontractor proposal (equipment list, personnel, consumables, and qualifications).
	Perform engineering tasks associated with the Pre-Commissioning activities including site work under direction of the Pre-Commissioning Lead.
	Assists in preparation of punch list of activities to be completed before pre-commissioning and commissioning
	Provide formal and informal reporting of work progress and status.
	Ensure compliance with the Quality System Documentation requirements, review engineering documents for overall commissioning completeness and approval
	Develop and implement work procedures effectively.
	Develop appropriate ITR (inspection and Test records) also known as A and B check-sheets, ensuring compatibility with design and equipment datasheet for each tag item on P&amp;ID for review and approval
	Generate where applicable (either using Client Software or Excel) the Discipline Acceptance Certificate (DAC), Mechanical Completion Acceptance Certificate (MAC), System Acceptance Certificate (SAC), Facilities Acceptance Certificate (FAC) of completed systems on site for handover from Construction phase to Commissioning Team.
	Develop and maintain client, vendor and subcontractor relationship.
	Develop and track master punch-list register using either client proprietary software or excel to capture each discipline, sub-system, equipment tags; clearly showing status of cleared and outstanding item.
	Monitor and support subcontractors on site.
	Responsible for ensuring the effective implementation and adherence to Quality, Health &amp; Safety policies during pre-commissioning and commissioning activities.
	Develop systems and subsystems for mechanical discipline


Requirements


	HND or above in Engineering
	Professional Trade Certificate
	Minimum of 7 years in Mechanical Installation, Calibration, Troubleshooting, with at least 3 years in a supervisory role, experience in Completion Software and Commissioning processes.


Benefits


	Great work culture and multiple opportunities for growth and self-development.&nbsp;
	18 days of annual leave, excluding federal public holidays.&nbsp;
	Health insurance coverage.&nbsp;
	Monthly employer pension contribution.&nbsp;
",
  "datePosted": "2025-07-18",
  "validThrough": "2025-08-17",

Mechanical Completions Engineer Job at Oilserv Limited




        
    

        
        Oilserv Limited is a leading provider of integrated engineering, procurement, construction, installation & commissioning (EPCIC) services and complementary solutions across the asset and program life cycle within the onshore, offshore and subsea market segments of the oil and gas sector. Oilserv Limited was incorporated in 1992 and commenced operations in 1995.

We are recruiting to fill the positions below

Job Position: Mechanical Completions Engineer

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Contract

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Mechanical Completions Engineer will be responsible for developing safe procedures for installation, troubleshooting and completions of mechanical equipment.
	Development and reviews of mechanical scope of works during engineering, construction and commissioning phase of works.


Job Details
Leadership:


	Provide positive and professional leadership to technicians in all departments
	Contribute to the goal zero drive of HSE
	Provide advice and support to all projects within the Group on matters relating to any issue within the remit of mechanical commissioning works


Core/Technical:


	Takes part in project planning & Scheduling; prepares and keeps up -to- date the mechanical pre-commissioning and commissioning scope plans and procedures.
	Assists the Commissioning manager to co-ordinate overall Pre-commissioning, Commissioning and start-up processes of mechanical scope in new and existing pipelines and facilities from initial construction planning through to final handover to production operations/Owner.
	Participates in developing commissioning plans and procedures, together with other discipline engineers and operation personnel.
	Takes part in the Project review meetings to make sure that the commissioning requirements have been duly complied with.
	Assist with the assessment and selection of mechanical Pre-Commissioning subcontractor which includes review of subcontractor proposal (equipment list, personnel, consumables, and qualifications).
	Perform engineering tasks associated with the Pre-Commissioning activities including site work under direction of the Pre-Commissioning Lead.
	Assists in preparation of punch list of activities to be completed before pre-commissioning and commissioning
	Provide formal and informal reporting of work progress and status.
	Ensure compliance with the Quality System Documentation requirements, review engineering documents for overall commissioning completeness and approval
	Develop and implement work procedures effectively.
	Develop appropriate ITR (inspection and Test records) also known as A and B check-sheets, ensuring compatibility with design and equipment datasheet for each tag item on P&ID for review and approval
	Generate where applicable (either using Client Software or Excel) the Discipline Acceptance Certificate (DAC), Mechanical Completion Acceptance Certificate (MAC), System Acceptance Certificate (SAC), Facilities Acceptance Certificate (FAC) of completed systems on site for handover from Construction phase to Commissioning Team.
	Develop and maintain client, vendor and subcontractor relationship.
	Develop and track master punch-list register using either client proprietary software or excel to capture each discipline, sub-system, equipment tags; clearly showing status of cleared and outstanding item.
	Monitor and support subcontractors on site.
	Responsible for ensuring the effective implementation and adherence to Quality, Health & Safety policies during pre-commissioning and commissioning activities.
	Develop systems and subsystems for mechanical discipline


Requirements


	HND or above in Engineering
	Professional Trade Certificate
	Minimum of 7 years in Mechanical Installation, Calibration, Troubleshooting, with at least 3 years in a supervisory role, experience in Completion Software and Commissioning processes.


Benefits


	Great work culture and multiple opportunities for growth and self-development. 
	18 days of annual leave, excluding federal public holidays. 
	Health insurance coverage. 
	Monthly employer pension contribution. 
    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Marketer",
  "description": "Zhongxin Network Technology Company Limited is a start-up company that is into sales of computer, phone and accessories.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly driven and results-oriented Marketer to join our growing team.
	This pivotal role is responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building strategic relationships, and ultimately driving revenue growth for the company.
	The ideal candidate will be a persuasive communicator, a skilled negotiator, and possess a deep understanding of the sales cycle, from lead generation to closing deals.


Key Responsibilities
Campaign Development &amp; Execution:


	Assist in the planning, development, and execution of integrated marketing campaigns across digital and traditional channels (e.g., social media, email, content marketing, print, events).
	Coordinate with internal teams (e.g., sales, product) and external partners (e.g., agencies, vendors) to ensure seamless campaign delivery.
	Monitor campaign performance and identify areas for optimization.


Content Creation &amp; Management:


	Create compelling and engaging marketing content, including but not limited to website copy, blog posts, social media updates, email newsletters, and basic promotional materials.
	Ensure all content aligns with brand guidelines and marketing objectives.
	Assist in managing content calendars and ensuring timely publication.


Digital Marketing Support:


	Support the management of social media platforms, including scheduling posts, engaging with the audience, and monitoring trends.
	Assist in the execution of email marketing campaigns, including list segmentation and performance tracking.
	Contribute to SEO efforts by assisting with keyword research and content optimization.
	Utilize digital analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics) to track website traffic and user behavior, providing basic reports.


Market Research &amp; Analysis:


	Conduct basic market research to understand customer needs, market trends, and competitor activities.
	Assist in analyzing marketing data to derive insights and inform future strategies.


Brand Consistency:


	Ensure brand consistency across all marketing materials and communications.
	Adhere to established brand guidelines in all marketing activities.


Communication &amp; Collaboration:


	Communicate effectively with team members and other departments regarding marketing initiatives.
	Actively participate in team meetings and brainstorming sessions.


Reporting:


	
	Prepare regular reports on marketing campaign performance and key metrics.
	


Qualifications


	Education: Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Mass Communication, or a related field.
	Experience: 1 - 2 years of proven experience in a marketing role, preferably in industry if relevant, e.g., tech, retail, financial services].
	Skills


Technical Skills:


	Proficiency in social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, etc.).
	Familiarity with email marketing platforms (e.g., Mailchimp, Constant Contact).
	Basic understanding of SEO principles.
	Knowledge of digital analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics).
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Experience with graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, basic Adobe Creative Suite) is a plus.


Soft Skills:


	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Strong creative thinking and content development abilities.
	Good analytical and problem-solving skills.
	High attention to detail and strong organizational skills.
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.
	Proactive and results-oriented.
	Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
	Eagerness to learn and adapt to new marketing trends and technologies.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should foward their CV to:&nbsp;hrzhongxinnetwork@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Marketer Job at Zhongxin Network Technology Company Limited




        
    

        
        Zhongxin Network Technology Company Limited is a start-up company that is into sales of computer, phone and accessories.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly driven and results-oriented Marketer to join our growing team.
	This pivotal role is responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building strategic relationships, and ultimately driving revenue growth for the company.
	The ideal candidate will be a persuasive communicator, a skilled negotiator, and possess a deep understanding of the sales cycle, from lead generation to closing deals.


Key Responsibilities
Campaign Development & Execution:


	Assist in the planning, development, and execution of integrated marketing campaigns across digital and traditional channels (e.g., social media, email, content marketing, print, events).
	Coordinate with internal teams (e.g., sales, product) and external partners (e.g., agencies, vendors) to ensure seamless campaign delivery.
	Monitor campaign performance and identify areas for optimization.


Content Creation & Management:


	Create compelling and engaging marketing content, including but not limited to website copy, blog posts, social media updates, email newsletters, and basic promotional materials.
	Ensure all content aligns with brand guidelines and marketing objectives.
	Assist in managing content calendars and ensuring timely publication.


Digital Marketing Support:


	Support the management of social media platforms, including scheduling posts, engaging with the audience, and monitoring trends.
	Assist in the execution of email marketing campaigns, including list segmentation and performance tracking.
	Contribute to SEO efforts by assisting with keyword research and content optimization.
	Utilize digital analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics) to track website traffic and user behavior, providing basic reports.


Market Research & Analysis:


	Conduct basic market research to understand customer needs, market trends, and competitor activities.
	Assist in analyzing marketing data to derive insights and inform future strategies.


Brand Consistency:


	Ensure brand consistency across all marketing materials and communications.
	Adhere to established brand guidelines in all marketing activities.


Communication & Collaboration:


	Communicate effectively with team members and other departments regarding marketing initiatives.
	Actively participate in team meetings and brainstorming sessions.


Reporting:


	
	Prepare regular reports on marketing campaign performance and key metrics.
	


Qualifications


	Education: Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Mass Communication, or a related field.
	Experience: 1 - 2 years of proven experience in a marketing role, preferably in industry if relevant, e.g., tech, retail, financial services].
	Skills


Technical Skills:


	Proficiency in social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, etc.).
	Familiarity with email marketing platforms (e.g., Mailchimp, Constant Contact).
	Basic understanding of SEO principles.
	Knowledge of digital analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics).
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Experience with graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, basic Adobe Creative Suite) is a plus.


Soft Skills:


	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Strong creative thinking and content development abilities.
	Good analytical and problem-solving skills.
	High attention to detail and strong organizational skills.
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.
	Proactive and results-oriented.
	Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
	Eagerness to learn and adapt to new marketing trends and technologies.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should foward their CV to: hrzhongxinnetwork@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "title": "Sales and Marketing Executive",
  "description": "Erisco Foods Limited is an indigenous food product manufacturer, incorporated in Nigeria in 2004 and started operations in 2009, manufacturing Tomato Paste, Seasoning, Rice, Milk cubes and more. We are firmly committed to producing high-quality products that combine nourishment with value pricing, as they strive to become one of Nigeria&rsquo;s largest indigenous foodmanufacturers on a global scale.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales and Marketing Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Benin, Edo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a results-driven Sales and Marketing Executive to join our dynamic team in Benin City.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving sales growth, developing marketing strategies, and building strong customer relationships.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and pursue new sales opportunities
	Develop and implement effective marketing campaigns
	Promote company products/services to target customers
	Conduct market research and competitor analysis
	Maintain relationships with existing clients and ensure customer satisfaction
	Achieve monthly and quarterly sales targets
	Prepare and present regular sales performance reports.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field
	Proven experience in sales and marketing
	Excellent communication and negotiation skills
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Strong knowledge of the Benin City market is an advantage
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@ersicofoodsltd.com.ng&nbsp;using &ldquo;Sales and Marketing Executive - Benin&rdquo; as the subject of the email.",

Sales and Marketing Executive Job at Erisco Foods Limited




        
    

        
        Erisco Foods Limited is an indigenous food product manufacturer, incorporated in Nigeria in 2004 and started operations in 2009, manufacturing Tomato Paste, Seasoning, Rice, Milk cubes and more. We are firmly committed to producing high-quality products that combine nourishment with value pricing, as they strive to become one of Nigeria’s largest indigenous foodmanufacturers on a global scale.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales and Marketing Executive

Job Location: Benin, Edo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a results-driven Sales and Marketing Executive to join our dynamic team in Benin City.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving sales growth, developing marketing strategies, and building strong customer relationships.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and pursue new sales opportunities
	Develop and implement effective marketing campaigns
	Promote company products/services to target customers
	Conduct market research and competitor analysis
	Maintain relationships with existing clients and ensure customer satisfaction
	Achieve monthly and quarterly sales targets
	Prepare and present regular sales performance reports.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field
	Proven experience in sales and marketing
	Excellent communication and negotiation skills
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Strong knowledge of the Benin City market is an advantage
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@ersicofoodsltd.com.ng using “Sales and Marketing Executive - Benin” as the subject of the email.
